title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 883.3 - Exempt use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 883.3 - Exempt use

State Regulations

The following uses shall be exempt from charge: (a) nonconsumptive uses of less than 1,000
gallons during any day, and less than 100,000 gallons during any
quarter; (b) ballast water used for
shipping purposes; (c) water taken, withdrawn or diverted from streams tributary to the river master's gauging
station at Montague; and
(d) water
taken, withdrawn or diverted below RM 38 (the mouth of the Cohansey River) and
such proportion of waters taken, diverted or withdrawn above RM 38 and below RM
92.4 (the mouth of the Schuylkill River) as the executive director may
determine, on the basis of hydrologic studies, would have no discernible effect
upon the maintenance of the salt front below the mouth of the Schuylkill

River. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
883.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
